verses.verse: Now these are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, who came <S%H935><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%> (every man <S%H376><s%> and his household <S%H1004><s%> came <S%H935><s%> with Jacob <S%H3290><s%>):
Reuben <S%H7205><s%>, Simeon <S%H8095><s%>, Levi <S%H3878><s%>, and Judah <S%H3063><s%>,
Issachar <S%H3485><s%>, Zebulun <S%H2074><s%>, and Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>,
Dan <S%H1835><s%> and Naphtali <S%H5321><s%>, Gad <S%H1410><s%> and Asher <S%H836><s%>.

And all the souls <S%H5315><s%> that came out <S%H3318><s%> of the loins <S%H3409><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> were seventy <S%H7657><s%> souls <S%H5315><s%>: and Joseph <S%H3130><s%> was in Egypt already <S%H4714><s%>.
And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> died <S%H4191><s%>, and all his brethren <S%H251><s%>, and all that generation <S%H1755><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were fruitful <S%H6509><s%>, and increased abundantly <S%H8317><s%>, and multiplied <S%H7235><s%>, and waxed exceeding <S%H3966><s%> mighty <S%H6105><s%>; and the land <S%H776><s%> was filled with them <S%H4390><s%>.
Now there arose <S%H6965><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> over Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, who knew <S%H3045><s%> not Joseph <S%H3130><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto his people <S%H5971><s%>, Behold <S%H5971><s%>, the people of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> are more <S%H7227><s%> and mightier than we <S%H6099><s%>:

come <S%H3051><s%>, let us deal wisely <S%H2449><s%> with them <S%H7235><s%>, lest they multiply, and it come to pass <S%H7122><s%>, that, when there falleth out any war <S%H4421><s%>, they <S%H1931><s%> also join <S%H3254><s%> themselves unto our enemies <S%H8130><s%>, and fight <S%H3898><s%> against us <S%H5927><s%>, and get them up out of the land <S%H776><s%>.

Therefore they did set <S%H7760><s%> over them taskmasters <S%H4522><s%> to afflict <S%H6031><s%> them with their burdens <S%H5450><s%>. And they built <S%H1129><s%> for Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> store-cities <S%H4543><s%>, Pithom <S%H6619><s%> and Raamses <S%H7486><s%>.

But the more they afflicted <S%H6031><s%> them <S%H3651><s%>, the more they multiplied <S%H7235><s%> and the more they spread abroad <S%H6555><s%>. And they were grieved <S%H6973><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
And the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> made <S%H5647><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to serve <S%H5647><s%> with rigor <S%H6531><s%>:

and they made <S%H4843><s%> their lives <S%H2416><s%> bitter <S%H4843><s%> with hard <S%H7186><s%> service <S%H5656><s%>, in mortar <S%H2563><s%> and in brick <S%H3843><s%>, and in all manner of service <S%H5656><s%> in the field <S%H7704><s%>, all their service <S%H5656><s%>, wherein they made them serve <S%H5647><s%> with rigor <S%H6531><s%>.

And the king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> to the Hebrew <S%H5680><s%> midwives <S%H3205><s%>, of whom the name <S%H8034><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> was Shiphrah <S%H8236><s%>, and the name <S%H8034><s%> of the other <S%H8145><s%> Puah <S%H6326><s%>:

and he said <S%H559><s%>, When ye do the office of a midwife <S%H3205><s%> to the Hebrew women <S%H5680><s%>, and see <S%H7200><s%> them upon the birth-stool <S%H70><s%>; if it be a son <S%H1121><s%>, then ye shall kill <S%H4191><s%> him <S%H1323><s%>; but if it be a daughter, then she shall live <S%H2425><s%>.

But the midwives <S%H3205><s%> feared <S%H3372><s%> God <S%H430><s%>, and did <S%H6213><s%> not as the king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> commanded <S%H1696><s%> them <S%H2421><s%>, but saved the men-children <S%H3206><s%> alive <S%H2421><s%>.

And the king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> for the midwives <S%H3205><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H4069><s%>, Why have ye done <S%H6213><s%> this thing <S%H1697><s%>, and have saved <S%H2421><s%> the men-children <S%H3206><s%> alive <S%H2421><s%>?

And the midwives <S%H3205><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, Because the Hebrew <S%H5680><s%> women <S%H802><s%> are not as the Egyptian women <S%H4713><s%>; for they are lively <S%H2422><s%>, and are delivered <S%H3205><s%> ere <S%H2962><s%> the midwife <S%H3205><s%> come unto them <S%H935><s%>.
And God <S%H430><s%> dealt well <S%H3190><s%> with the midwives <S%H3205><s%>: and the people <S%H5971><s%> multiplied <S%H7235><s%>, and waxed very <S%H3966><s%> mighty <S%H6105><s%>.
And it came to pass <S%H3205><s%>, because the midwives feared <S%H3372><s%> God <S%H430><s%>, that he made <S%H6213><s%> them households <S%H1004><s%>.

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> charged <S%H6680><s%> all his people <S%H5971><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Every son <S%H1121><s%> that is born <S%H3209><s%> ye shall cast <S%H7993><s%> into the river <S%H2975><s%>, and every daughter <S%H1323><s%> ye shall save alive <S%H2421><s%>.
